name: Web 360Yunpan
description: 360Yunpan is an online cloud storage software launched by Qihoo 360. It provides large-capacity file storage, backup, transfer and sharing services for common users. 360Yunpan also supports real-time synchronization and backup of files besides the basic service of file upload and download.

en_US.description: 360Yunpan is an online cloud storage software launched by Qihoo 360. It provides large-capacity file storage, backup, transfer and sharing services for common users. 360Yunpan also supports real-time synchronization and backup of files besides the basic service of file upload and download.
en_US.name: 360Yunpan

zh_CN.description: 360云盘是奇虎360公司推出的在线云储存软件，为广大普通网民提供大容量的文件存储、备份、传递和共享服务。360云盘除了提供最基本的文件上传下载服务外，还提供文件实时同步备份功能。
zh_CN.name: 360云盘网页版
